sourceMeaningMnemonic: There's a <radical>tsunami</radical> coming, but the escape <radical>slide</radical> is being blocked by a <radical>drunkard</radical> and <radical>creeper</radical>, and you can see your chances of escaping <kanji>decrease</kanji> rapidly.
meaningInfo: Imagine how you feel as you try to get down the tsunami slide, past the drunkard and the creeper, who are decreasing your chances of getting away.
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>decrease</kanji> in the chances of escaping the tsunami is really upsetting <reading>Gen</reading>ji (<ja>げん</ja>), who's waiting impatiently behind you.
readingInfo: Picture Genji, as his chances of survival decrease along with yours. Poor Genji.
